### Additional Information

<hr>

#### Purchase RStudio Professional Products

For more information about running RStudio Professional products on your own enterprise infrastructure or details about pricing, please [contact our sales team](https://www.rstudio.com/about/contact-sales/).

#### Documentation

Documentation for all RStudio products is available from [our website](http://docs.rstudio.com/) or can be accessed within the products in the Quickstart.

#### Sample Mail Server
  
A [sample mail server](webmail/) is available within the Quickstart to demonstrate RStudio Connectâ€™s capability for sending automated, customized emails. In the Quickstart, all email from RStudio products is configured to be sent into a single mailbox. In an real-world installation, RStudio Products integrate securely with your email infrastructure to ensure that information remains private.

#### Support

Support is available for the Quickstart via the [RStudio Community forums](https://community.rstudio.com/tags/c/r-admin/quickstart) in the R-Admins category for questions with the "quickstart" tag. Please note that professional support is not available for the Quickstart.

#### Scope of Use

The Quickstart is primarily intended as a demo environment and is **not** supported for use in any production capacity. For more information about using RStudio Professional products on your own enterprise infrastructure, please [contact our sales team](https://www.rstudio.com/about/contact-sales/).
